short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Space City Weather look better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the styling and layout of SpaceCityWeather.com. It removes the superfluous sidebar, enlarges the photos for better viewing, scales better for vertical monitors, and removes the share buttons. The result is cleaner, more easily viewable and interpretable page.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
